careers.stats: Start with Tough 0, Sharp -1, Steady +1, then increase your choice by 1.
careers.description: You own and work a modest farm. It's enough to keep you and your family, but it's not huge. Lifestyle: working class.

recovery.movebody: When you receive appropriate medical treatment (GM's call), recover Suffer Harm. When you build a basic human relationship with someone (their player's call), recover one of Take a Risk, Keep it Together, or Study, your choice.

move.movebody: You have seen a lot of bad things happen, without rhyme or reason. That's just how things are. You get +1 to Hold It Together unless the source of stress is supernatural.

history.movebody: Choose two or more: Your spouse _________ who would like to move to somewhere more exciting. Your neighbour _________. There's a long-running dispute between you, about the boundary survey. Your parents, _________, who have moved in to your farm (either a wing of your house or a cottage next door) for their retirement. Your clubmates at the ___________ club in town. Your kid _________ who can't wait to take over the farm. Your supplier for ___________ in town. You've been chatting whenever you need to pick up more for years and years now.
